TO: NABB BOARD OF DIRECTORS
From:
Res
Frank E» Schooley
Subscription Television
Inquiry #1
11-17-54■
lo Should NAEB take a position on subscription television?
Should it file if and when the Commission requests comments?
If you are not familiar with the latest may I suggest you
read Page 31 of BROADCASTING magazine, dated November 15„
I am making a similar request for opinion of the Engineering
Committee, of the Television Development Committee, and of our
legal counselo
cc: Skornia
